meanings.definition: A herbicide used to control broadleaf weeds
meanings.sent1: Farmers sprayed picloram on the fields to kill unwanted plants.
meanings.sent2: The gardeners applied picloram to get rid of the pesky dandelions.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbits thought picloram was a tasty treat, not a weed killer!
meanings.sent4: Picloram worked like magic, wiping out the invasive species in just a few days.
meanings.sent5: The powerful picloram left the garden looking pristine and weed-free.

meanings.sent2: The lab technician handled picloram with caution due to its chemical composition.
meanings.sent3: In the chemistry class, the students marveled at the complexity of picloram.
meanings.sent4: The unique formula of picloram intrigued researchers around the world.
meanings.sent5: Picloram's molecular structure fascinated the scientific community.
